info.task: navigate to last checked radio button in group
info.title: Navigate to the last checked radio button in a group

setupScript.name: checkThirdRadioButtonAndSetFocusAfterRadioGroup
setupScript.description: sets the state of the third radio button to checked, and sets focus on a link after the radio group

user: Navigate to the last radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the last radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name of the radio button, 'Thin crust', is conveyed
State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 3, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
